thread.title: Brad Pitt sports grey hair for 'War Machine'
thread.title_full: Brad Pitt sports grey hair for 'War Machine' - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Brad Pitt sports grey hair for 'War Machine'
text:
Los Angeles: Hollywood star Brad Pitt was seen sporting grey hair on the sets of his new film, "War Machine".


Brad Pitt. Pic/Santa Banta 
Pitt, 51, was seen in a rugged soldier look, wearing grey army camos and combat boots to add to his new hair, reported E! online.
Netflix's satirical comedy is inspired by Michael Hastings' memoir "The Operators: The Wild and Terrifying Inside Story of America's War in Afghanistan".
The "Fury" actor will reportedly play the character based on Stanley McChrystal, the controversial general who commanded US armed forces in Afghanistan.
